metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28591 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in the AMF FileAMFParserContext::endElement() functionality of Slic3r libslic3r 1.3.0 andMaster Commit 92abbc42. A specially crafted AMF file can lead toinformation disclosure. An attacker can provide a malicious file to triggerthis vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
